CreateSelectiveCredential.document: This example shows you how to create a selective disclosure credential.
CreateSelectiveCredential.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdid.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSelectiveCredential
<Common request parameters>

{
    "FunctionArg": {
        "Type": [
            "VerifiableCredential",
            "original"
        ],
        "Context": "https://github.com/WeBankFinTech/WeIdentity/blob/master/context/v1",
        "ClaimJson": "{\"name\": \"zhang san\", \"id\": \"did:tdid:15:0x3b67623cbdaa9ccbfc8b7c346588c6bcbc6f5d63\", \"age\": 18}",
        "CptId": 2000000,
        "ExpirationDate": 1871212353,
        "Id": "657b9ea7-99d3-4068-9c2b-fe1593929474",
        "IssuanceDate": 1628588966,
        "Issuer": "did:tdid:cb591-1:0x0e6c51028750e90815bbb3968fbb58c1c9fe8e08",
        "Proof": {
            "Created": 1628588966,
            "Creator": "did:tdid:cb591-1:0x0e6c51028750e90815bbb3968fbb58c1c9fe8e08#keys-0",
            "SignatureValue": "KhaMad6Y80VqKRFUH++j7odpEQwtlhCJhiON8lvo+fd9XJF9yV9skrd5khNSGcFSI8hibZpJvkN+Lp4tVG10nwA=",
            "Type": "Secp256k1",
            "SaltJson": "{\"age\":\"bTPhh\",\"id\":\"sSPRi\",\"name\":\"GB5uR\"}"
        }
    },
    "PolicyId": 2000014
}
CreateSelectiveCredential.title: CreateSelectiveCredential

VerifyCredential.document: This example shows you how to verify a credential.
VerifyCredential.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdid.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VerifyCredential
<Common request parameters>

{
    "FunctionArg": {
        "ClaimJson": "{\"name\": \"zhang san\", \"id\": \"did:tdid:15:0x3b67623cbdaa9ccbfc8b7c346588c6bcbc6f5d63\", \"age\": 18}",
        "CptId": 2000000,
        "ExpirationDate": 1871212353,
        "Context": "https://github.com/WeBankFinTech/WeIdentity/blob/master/context/v1",
        "Proof": {
            "SignatureValue": "IL/CtZKrg+g395nYZbXT/Uzk1N3/NG/tgjbjeMf03shcGl7jSRXgVk3zz+x5zp11OBApb43By6VjWdPUJJLJMQA=",
            "Created": 1627803566,
            "Type": "Secp256k1",
            "SaltJson": "{\"age\":\"o58g1\",\"id\":\"X5efp\",\"name\":\"pu2UZ\"}",
            "Creator": 1627803566
        },
        "Id": "9bff9f22-2794-4d1e-b598-894163392cd9",
        "Type": [
            "VerifiableCredential",
            "original"
        ],
        "IssuanceDate": 1627803566,
        "Issuer": "did:tdid:15:0x4c59267a10ed54857842674d0c76ab708c6275f5"
    }
}
VerifyCredential.title: VerifyCredential
